summary: Hershey's stock has outperformed the S&P 500. Read more on how this confectionary giant may surprise investors in 2025 despite high cocoa prices and other headwinds.

headline: Hershey Announces Stacy Taffet as Chief Growth Officer
summary: The Hershey Company (NYSE: HSY) today announced Stacy Taffet as its Chief Growth Officer, effective April 14, 2025. In this role, she will be responsible for driving transformative growth strategies across the company's expanding snacks portfolio, which includes iconic brands like Hershey's, Reese's, Jolly Rancher and Dot's Homestyle Pretzels.
